title: Chasing lizards
creator_credit: Alan Mitchell and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Threatening nightmares plague a young man who is still disturbed by an uncomfortable incident in his childhood. With the encouragement of his lover he locates his would-be assailant, searching for an end to his depressive madness.
creator_credit_for_label: Alan Mitchell and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
